steps: 1. Allow the solidified sample to cool for an additional 30 minutes at room temperature.
2. Gently remove the solid from the crucible; if necessary, use a small chisel or hammer to break away any adhered material.
3. Sand the surfaces of the sample to achieve a smooth finish, ensuring dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.
4. Optionally, seal the sample with a protective coating to prevent oxidation.
